name: df-pstm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cpstm, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cpsmet)), cmpo(s1, s2, cqs(cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cmetid, cv(s0))), cqs(cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cmetid, cv(s0))), cuni(cab(s3, wrex(s4, cv(s1), wrex(s5, cv(s2), wceq(cv(s3), co(cv(s4), cv(s0), cv(s5))))))))))
comment: Define the metric induced by a pseudometric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)
